sports-social.title: Neighbourhood
sports-social.description: Neighbourhood is a content-sharing platform allowing users to find new events and promotions in their city.

hollo.title: Hollo - Axolotl Control
hollo.description: Axolotl Control is a web application that allows users to assess and improve their mental health with the use of algorithms and AI.

parallelchain-explorer.title: ParallelChain Explorer
parallelchain-explorer.description: ParallelChain Explorer is a blockchain explorer that allows users to view transactions, blocks, and other information stored on the ParallelChain blockchain.

algol.title: Algol
algol.description: Algol is a service built using ERC721 protocol that allows admins to issue and manage credentials like passports, degree certs, transcripts, medical records etc.
